alert.note: Alert for Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 18 at 3:23AM PST until November 20 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT PST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Western Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight PST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
